## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{02nons1r}
ciphertext: 0xf9e6687e877239c0efa9f2df4810c47b66c7ed47f8cae57c4500299e122d635f4206b6f51eee6ac0f057f8e645be57ed61a0dbeab099b78b293d2d54d8e323a
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (7600993097086415988547245102731092936327558646599845716759207863288462544396857327624971113390810577096160511463504861619779185055776882509264899702558751, 3)

archetype: signature_schemes
